item.title: Setting up a modern PHP Project with great Workflow
item.description: Overview This post is about setting up a new PHP project. When creating a new project, it is important to make sure that the workflow is easy to follow and can later be automated. See Continuous Integration Summary We are going to use Composer Autoload to manage our packages and dependencies. – Everytime a new class is added, autoload file will have to be regenerated. Sample code contains a Cat class with two unit tests.
